slides.title: Percentage Basics
slides.content:
**Percentage:** Parts per hundred (%)
**Formula:** (Part/Whole) × 100
**Conversions:**
Fraction to %: Multiply by 100
% to Fraction: Divide by 100
% to Decimal: Divide by 100

slides.title: Percentage Problems
slides.content:
**Finding %:** 20% of 500 = (20/100)×500 = 100
**Increase:** New = Old + (Old × %/100)
**Decrease:** New = Old - (Old × %/100)
**Discount:** Sale Price = MRP - (MRP × Discount%/100)
